DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Drugs use chemotherapy use different way stop tumor cell divide stop grow die . PURPOSE : Phase III trial study effectiveness paclitaxel treat old patient solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Paclitaxel Treating Older Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine whether relationship pharmacokinetic measurement paclitaxel age . - Determine whether relationship toxic effect paclitaxel age . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord age ( cohort 1 : patient 55 64 v cohort 2 : patient 65 75 v cohort 3 : patient 75 ) .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically prove nonhematologic malignancy PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 55 Performance status : Zubrod 02 Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Granulocyte count least 1,500/mm3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin le 1.5 mg/dL SGOT le 2.0 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) Renal : Creatinine great 1.5 time ULN Cardiovascular : No uncontrolled severe cardiovascular disease Other : No serious intercurrent medical illness judgement investigator compromise patient care No psychiatric condition would preclude study No requirement antibiotic active acute infection PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : At least 4 week since prior chemotherapy ( 6 week nitrosoureas mitomycin ) No one prior chemotherapy regimen allow No prior paclitaxel allow Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : At least 4 week since prior radiation therapy Surgery : Not specify
DOC.keyword: unspecified adult solid tumor , protocol specific
